title: Best of The Herd: 09/06/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/06/2018
description:
Colin says that Le'Veon Bell made a choice a long time ago to be a running back and that has consequences like not getting guaranteed money long term in the NFL. He does hist first Herd Hierarchy ranking the top ten NFL teams including a huge surprise in the top four. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about the Falcons/Eagles season opener and how the Panthers will attack the Cowboys. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
